member.title: Not eligible to claim FAR tokens? Don’t sweat it.
member.text: FAR tokens can be swapped on a NEAR-supported DEX.

farm.title: Verify your Discord to see if you’re eligible for a one-time claim of FAR tokens.

form.error: Please enter a NEAR wallet address.

farm.congrats: Congrats on being an Early FAR member! We’re sending an airdrop to your wallet.
list: 52.5 million tokens (10.5% of the total supply of FAR) will be claimable in a series of airdrops.
To ensure a fair launch of FAR, there is an allocation of tokens available on Ref Finance as part of an IFO (Initial Farm Offering).

farStaking.title: FAR Staking
farStaking.subTitle: Stake your FAR tokens and earn NEAR, plus earn extra FAR.

farFarming.title: FAR Farming
farFarming.subTitle: Provide liquidity into the FAR ecosystem to yield farm FAR.

rewards.rewardsNoAvailable: Sorry, Few and Far DeFi isn’t available in the U.S. It’s so we can remain regulatory compliant.
rewards.rewardsComingSoon: Few and Far DeFi is launching soon. Stay tuned for upcoming news.

earnNEARGoFAR.title: Earn NEAR. Go FAR.
earnNEARGoFAR.subTitle: FAR gets you NEAR. Get it? It’s ironic.
earnNEARGoFAR.description: Get places with FAR as an incentive for participating in the Few and Far ecosystem. Down the line, FAR will be the governance token of our future DAO. Prolly nothing.
earnNEARGoFAR.stakeDescription: Stake FAR tokens and earn trading rewards. WAGMI, degens.
earnNEARGoFAR.tradingDescription: 100% of Few and Far’s trading fees are distributed to FAR stakers. It’s a no-brainer (not like we invented this sh*t!).
earnNEARGoFAR.lpDescription: Provide liquidity into the FAR ecosystem and yield farm NEAR until your heart’s content.

farming.apr:
Farming rewards will be distributed to NEAR-FAR LP token stakers as a proportion of the amount of liquidity they provide to farming pools on Ref Finance.

Rates shown are estimates and fluctuate according to many different factors. They are subject to change if course-correction is needed to sustain the economy.
farming.stake: LP tokens can be purchased from a NEAR-FAR farming pool on Ref Finance and staked on the Few and Far platform to earn FAR rewards.
farming.totalAmountStaked: LP tokens currently staked with Few and Far. These tokens are accumulating rewards. To access these tokens, you must first unstake and then withdraw them.
farming.farmedFar: Farmed FAR represents the amount of rewards earned from farming. To access these tokens, you must harvest them.

staking.apr:
Trading rewards will be distributed to FAR stakers as a proportion of the number of tokens they stake. This means you lock up value over a period of time to strengthen the platform’s ecosystem. Rewards are commensurate with levels of participation and commitment.

Rates shown are estimates and fluctuate according to many different factors. They are subject to change if course-correction is needed to sustain the economy.
staking.stake: FAR tokens currently staked with Few and Far. These tokens are accumulating rewards. To access these tokens, you must first unstake and then withdraw them.
staking.earnedNear: Earned NEAR represents rewards that have accumlated from staking. To access these tokens, you must collect them.
staking.earnedFar: Earned FAR represents rewards that have accumulated from staking. To access these tokens, you must collect them.
staking.totalAmountStaked: FAR tokens currently staked with Few and Far. To access these tokens, you must first unstake and then withdraw them.

rewards.errorBalance: Cannot get balance. Please try again

welcomeTerraLuna.title: Creators
welcomeTerraLuna.heroTitle: A one-stop destination for next-generation digital creators.
welcomeTerraLuna.creatorTitle: Extending a Helping Hand to Terra Creators
welcomeTerraLuna.creatorDescription:
Few and Far is a team committed to helping NFT projects migrate from the Terra ecosystem and will provide added funding, marketing, and launchpad support looking to migrate away from the ailing DeFi protocol.
br/> Have an existing NFT collection Terra? Get in touch with our team and let’s get to work.
welcomeTerraLuna.storyDescription: Few and Far is a community-driven platform. We work hard to be responsive, help those around us, and in service to the best collections on NEAR Protocol and beyond.
welcomeTerraLuna.getTouchDescription: We offer creators the greatest liquidity, ability to earn, and listings from the top collections on NEAR Protocol.
welcomeTerraLuna.getTouchDescription2: Few and Far is now accepting projects looking for a fresh start from Terra! Let our exclusive NFT bridge combined with leading marketplace technology help you.
getTouchList2: Exclusive NFT bridge technology from Terra to NEAR Protocol.
The greatest potential for a fresh start on a new chain
A hassle-free bridge with dedicated development support
welcomeTerraLuna.getTouchDescription3: We offer early members of the Few and Far community exclusive access to whitelists, token airdrops, and more.
welcomeTerraLuna.partenersTitle: Supported by Top Venture Funds Who Love Web3
welcomeTerraLuna.partenersDescription: Few and Far is backed by the world’s leading web3 venture funds, on-chain partnerships, and the NEAR Foundation.
welcomeTerraLuna.getTouchDescription4: Have questions? Want to find out more about Few and Far?
welcomeTerraLuna.getTouchDescription5: Want to learn more about Few and Far?
welcomeTerraLuna.getTouchDescription6: We’re always looking for FAR Out folks. Join our community!
